comments.author: Kevin BÃ¶ing
comments.body: Hey Thomas first of all great blog you have created here. Instead of reading the bytes in a loop, I would recommend setting the bytes with bytets.set(data,0) and to read the bytes into the data I would recommend data.set(bytes.slice(0, data.length)). This will increase the performance. Have you perhaps evaluated whether there is an even faster way to pass the imageData to the WebAssembly code?
